data.message:
What are people thinking when they call someone a nigger, what are people thinking when the put their finger on the trigger, what are people thinking, when they commit these crimes, what are they thinking, its happening all the time. What crosses peoples thoughts when they pull out a knife and what makes them want to destroy innocent peoples lives. Why is it when anyone even looks at you once, Chav’s think its necessary to pull out a gun. BANG. The UK is getting scabbier by the day, the government letting protesters get their way, as civilians don’t get their say. The general public, looking in awe, watching in horror wondering why chav’s are doing this for, britain’s geting poorer. I can’t believe Britain can sleep at night, when murderers, terrorists and pedo’s are potentially in sight, criminals turning off  lights, we still need to separate wrong from right 
Chorus: Oi, yeah you sittin on the wall, whos the baddest of them all, you can see it better believe it, everyone can see you fall
